SEARCH
Package players

Class Player

java.lang.Object
players.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the game, tracking their state such as money, position, properties, jail status, and special conditions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player(String name)
    Constructs a player with the given name and default settings.
    Player(String name, Color color)
    Constructs a player with a given name and token color.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name)
      Constructs a player with the given name and default settings.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player

    • Player

      public Player(String name, Color color)
      Constructs a player with a given name and token color.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player
      color - the color representing the player

  • Method Details

    • receive

      public void receive(int money)
      Increases the player's money by the given amount.
      Parameters:
      money - the amount to add

    • pay

      public void pay(int money)
      Decreases the player's money by the given amount. Sets the player as bankrupt if their money drops below zero.
      Parameters:
      money - the amount to subtract

    • getColor

      public Color getColor()
      Gets the player's token color.
      Returns:
      the color of the player

    • goToJail

      public void goToJail()
      Sends the player to jail and sets the jail turn counter.

    • getOutOfJail

      public void getOutOfJail()
      Releases the player from jail.

    • decreaseJailTurn

      public void decreaseJailTurn()
      Decreases the number of turns remaining in jail by one. Releases the player if the counter reaches zero.

    • addGetOutOfJailFreeCard

      public void addGetOutOfJailFreeCard()
      Adds a Get Out of Jail Free card to the player's inventory.

    • useGetOutOfJailFreeCard

      public boolean useGetOutOfJailFreeCard()
      Uses a Get Out of Jail Free card if the player has one.
      Returns:
      true if the card was used, false otherwise

    • move

      public void move(int position)
      Moves the player forward or backward on the board. Updates `passedGo` if the player crosses position 0.
      Parameters:
      position - number of spaces to move (can be negative)

    • passedGo

      public boolean passedGo()
      Checks if the player passed the "Go" tile during their last move.
      Returns:
      true if passed, false otherwise

    • setPassedGo

      public void setPassedGo(boolean passed)
      Sets whether the player has passed "Go".
      Parameters:
      passed - whether the player passed "Go"

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo(int newPosition)
      Moves the player directly to the specified board position.
      Parameters:
      newPosition - the destination position

    • isMissTurn

      public boolean isMissTurn()
      Checks if the player should skip their turn.
      Returns:
      true if turn should be skipped

    • setMissTurn

      public void setMissTurn(boolean missTurn)
      Sets whether the player should skip their next turn.
      Parameters:
      missTurn - true to skip next turn

    • addProperty

      public void addProperty(Property property)
      Adds a property to the player's collection.
      Parameters:
      property - the property to add

    • addStation

      public void addStation(Station station)
      Adds a station to the player's collection.
      Parameters:
      station - the station to add

      Removes a property by name (not implemented correctly — to be fixed if needed).
      Parameters:
      propertyName - the name of the property to remove

    • setNextDiscount

      public boolean setNextDiscount()
      Flags the player to receive a discount on the next payment.
      Returns:
      always returns true

    • useDiscount

      public boolean useDiscount()
      Clears the discount flag after use.
      Returns:
      always returns false

    • hasDiscount

      public boolean hasDiscount()
      Checks if the player has a discount.
      Returns:
      true if the player has a discount

      Returns:
      the number of stations

    • setMoveToNearestCity

      public void setMoveToNearestCity(boolean move)
      Sets the flag to move the player to the nearest city.
      Parameters:
      move - true to enable

    • moveToNearestCity

      public boolean moveToNearestCity()
      Checks if the player should move to the nearest city.
      Returns:
      true if movement is flagged
